Introduction

BLACK6IX was a six-member boy group formed by BLACK HOLE Entertainment. They debuted on April 7, 2017 with the release of their first single "Please". The meaning of their name is "six boys with infinite potential".

On April 16, 2021, BLACK6IX announced their disbandment following 4 years of promotions.
